mapper.select: select * from( SELECT rownum as recNum, a.goods_id, a.review_content, a.review_date, review_star, filename, b.goods_title from T_REVIEW_BOARD a , T_shopping_goods b where a.goods_id = b.goods_id order by review_date desc) where recNum between(#{section}-1)*100+(#{pageNum}-1)*10+1 and (#{section}-1)*100+#{pageNum}*10
mapper.update: UPDATE t_shopping_member SET member_point = member_point+500 WHERE member_id in (SELECT member_id FROM t_review_board WHERE fileName IS NOT NULL and review_no =#{review_no}) ;
mapper.select: select a.*,b.member_name,c.goods_id,c.goods_title from t_review_board a,t_shopping_member b, t_shopping_goods c where a.member_id = b.member_id and a.goods_id = c.goods_id and a.review_no= #{review_no}
